about-p1: In career transition to web development, I specialize in software testing as an apprentice. I master end-to-end test automation, API testing, test case management and web development.
about-p2: I have participated in various projects: eco-friendly sites, event platforms and financial applications, leading QA campaigns and test strategy.
about-p3: I work on debugging, optimization and accessibility, ensuring the quality and performance of web deliverables.
about-p4: I have also contributed to implementing AI in my company's SaaS, combining innovation and software quality.

Eco bliss bath.title: Eco bliss bath
Eco bliss bath.text: Functional test automation for an eco-friendly website. Analysis of existing manual tests and creation of scripts with Cypress (JavaScript). QA reporting and quality monitoring as part of external training.

724 events.title: 724 events
724 events.text: Functional and exploratory test campaign on an event website. Docker environment, bug tracking on JIRA and QA reporting.

Payforge.title: Payforge
Payforge.text: QA leadership and test strategy definition for an Agile financial application. Requirements coverage, per-sprint testing and non-regression campaigns on critical features.

Tests end-to-end.title: End-to-end testing
Tests end-to-end.text: Automate end-to-end tests to validate user journeys on web applications.

Postman.title: Postman
Postman.text: Test REST APIs via requests, verification scripts and automated collections.

Xray.title: Xray
Xray.text: Manage test cases in Jira: design, execution, campaign tracking and requirements coverage.

HTML - CSS.title: HTML - CSS
HTML - CSS.text: Build responsive web interfaces from mockups, with CSS animations and accessibility.

JavaScript.title: JavaScript
JavaScript.text: Create dynamic interactions and manipulate the DOM in modern web applications.

React.title: React
React.text: Develop reusable components and manage their state in reactive interfaces.

Gestion de projet QA.title: QA project management
Gestion de projet QA.text: Organize test phases, plan sprints, and collaborate with product and dev teams.

Debug & Optimisation.title: Debug & Optimization
Debug & Optimisation.text: Identify bugs, optimize SEO, improve performance and publish web deliverables.

Strat√©gies de test.title: Test strategies
Strat√©gies de test.text: Design and run functional, exploratory, API, unit and non-regression tests.
